title: 服务器经常在玩家输入命令中踢出玩家后台报错
author: linmiao233
txt_content:
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 --- DO NOT REPORT THIS TO PAPER - THIS IS NOT A BUG OR A CRASH  - git-Paper-66 (MC: 1.15.2) ---
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 The server has not responded for 15 seconds! Creating 进程 dump
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 Server 进程 dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Paper!):
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 警告 Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 15913ms or 318 ticks behind
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 Current Thread: Server thread
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 PID: 34 | Suspended: false | Native: false | State: TIMED_WAITING
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 Stack:
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 sun.misc.Unsafe.park(Native Method)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 java.util.concurrent.locks.LockSupport.parkNanos(LockSupport.java:215)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.IAsyncTaskHandler.bl(IAsyncTaskHandler.java:131)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.IAsyncTaskHandler.awaitTasks(IAsyncTaskHandler.java:120)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.sleepForTick(MinecraftServer.java:1015)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:938)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 ------------------------------
08.02 12:34:39 [服务器] 错误 --- DO NOT REPORT THIS TO PAPER - THIS IS NOT A BUG OR A CRASH ---复制代码

replies.author: zghh008
replies.txt_content: 该插件指令造成服务器卡顿超过15秒，服务器被强制关闭。

replies.author: linmiao233
replies.txt_content:
zghh008 发表于 2020-2-8 13:20
该插件指令造成服务器卡顿超过15秒，服务器被强制关闭。
服务器没有关闭 貌似是玩家被踢出了 重新连接就可以恢复

replies.author: zghh008
replies.txt_content:
应该是服务器卡顿的过程中，玩家掉线。你可以发一点玩家被踢出后的提示语。
如果是玩家发出指令后卡顿。应该是这个指令会卡服，可以看一下这个报错前最后一个发出的指令是什么
如果是输入指令的过程中卡服，应该是某个插件大量占用主线程造成卡顿。可以用一些监控插件监视插件性能，看谁的时间开销最大。
